content: Great for what I need. I just wish it would remember where I paused when I return to the app.

A glorious app that has brought me great joy. I tried to find a free solution to stream .mkv files from my PC to android phone before I knew about this, but none of them worked. Easy to set up and reliable. Best $3 I ever spent. I kinda wish my notifications bar would go away, but it's surprisingly easy to ignore. Still worth it.

Nothing but errors. This app used to be amazing but ever since it went to a paid "updated" version it's been nothing but a headache. Cant connect to my pc most of the time. Downloading to device freezes every 4 minutes of progress and wont complete. Such a disaster from an app that used to be amazing. I used to be such a big fan of everything vlc for so long but this is just garbage. So disappointing. And i bought and tried the paid version becauase what it USED to be was well worth it.
An excellent application!! Very intuitive and accommodates you're streaming needs perfectly...

Excellent..does. just what it is supposed to do.

Only gripe about this app is that it doesn't remember where you left off in a show. If you accidently back out of a show and you open it up it starts from the beginning. I still love this app, it works really well, mainly. I'd love to see the option to stream audio!

replyContent:
You'll find the 'connection help' button on the helper.

Please click on that and it should help you to run through the tests and troubleshooting to figure out what is blocking the connection.

If it doesn't, then please let me know what you get for each of the three tests. (my personal email is in the app)

content: No interruption in streaming even when I casted from my Nexus cell phone to chromecast.

convert slowly, can't support tv out

Does exactly what I needed and it works great!

This is a light weight, great functioning way to connect my tablet and mac to watch shows (mirrored from my tablet) on my TV.  I love it, when it has an automatic playlist function, I'm 5 starring it in a heart beat.  Worth the $2, hands down.

Latest update made this from my must have app on my smart phones to an app that barely does what it claims. Playback is currently horrible, and God forbid you close the app and open it again and pick up where you left off, it doesn't scrub through the video and sound is garbled.

Takes for ever to set up and asks u to download loads of software crap for your pc and to turn off your firewall witch u should never do and still takes 30mins to convert ur films from pc to android and im on fiber optic 30mins to 45mins what are we still in 2001 can not believe its 2015 and we can still not stream straight from pc to android 2 stars
Works great other than the fact that the noise is always funky. After about 10 minutes or so, I stop noticing,  but that's just me.

The latest version (2.0) has killed playback on my device, it will still stream from the server but all files kept on my Sony Z3 no longer playback. I have updated VLC Streamer Helper to the latest version and recreated several files, they still will not playback once copied to my Sony Z3........  ......version 2.03 has fixed the playback issue..thanks for the quick fix...:-)  ....After using 2.00.03 for a couple of days, even though it hasn't crashed like the earlier version use to do on a regular basis, the quality of the video is now cloudy and voices are out of sync. The earlier version had crisp video and no syncing problems...this new version needs a lot of work.  I would roll back to the old pre revamped program if I could that is how bad it is. I would rather have the odd crash than have to put up with this versions poor quality...:(  ......thanks for your response Hobbyist Software Ltd,  yes going to higher settings does improve the quality of the picture but the other issues are still there, even with the higher settings the quality isn't as crisp as with the earlier version
replyContent: Hi Robert, glad the playback is fixed. Re the poor quality - that is surprising. Can you check the settings on the helper app? What happens if you use a higher quality setting there?

content: But it has just never worked correctly. Have been just dealing with the frequent crashes and odd bugs.  But today's update killed all the videos stored on the device and now I have no media. replyContent:
Hi Casey,
Sorry you lost the ability to playback copied videos. We have fixed that in 2.01.
This is a major update to handle those frequent crashes you mention - please give it another go. I think you'll find it is a lot more solid now.

content: Works very well.   Easy to set up.   Never fails.

content: This app is a great concept, and for the few times I was able to use it successfully I really enjoyed it. Unfortunately, it constantly crashes on my Nexus 4, and it is extremely frustrating. Another serious issue is that scrolling is usually impossible.
replyContent: Hi Chaim, please do give it another go. We fixed a load of bugs in version 2.00, and have almost no reported crashes now.

content: This app works perfect on my tablet and laptop. Never have any problems.
I can't connect which is weird cause the ios version works great

Most apps I've used at most were buggy, however this app stopped working for me altogether. Worked fine for a day. Now I can't watch anything. It just loads forever. And when I click back, it freezes. The first time it froze, it was when I paused a video, then it said it can't play this video even though I already watched about 17 minutes of it. It froze and my tablet restarted automatically. And when I enter my pw, it never works. But my pw works on my Apple device. And it skips a lot sometimes when buffering. It actually works better on my iPod touch. But the screen is smaller. On the my iPod, the sound is distorted at times, but overall it's working better than the Android version for me as of now. Such a disappointment. Hope they fix this soon. Paid good money.

Not sure why new version of the app is not coming up.This has become too buggy off late. After upgrading to Android 4.4, am facing a lot of issues. For a start, the movie timeline shows a garbage start and end time and progress bar is always at the end. I don't know for sure what is the time of the current moment on the video. There are many others, I don't wanna go into depth of all those.. But earnestly, as I have contributed towards your rent payment, Mr. Developer, I really hope you fix the issue soon.
It works

When I got this app it seems great and work flawlessly. However, my computer started having all kinds of pop ups. Google search even had trouble working. I deleted the app off my computer just to see if it would change, and it did. DO NOT DOWNLOAD

The navigation bar takes too long to go away when playing media
Works better then anything else I've tried!

If I leave for a minute or a call comes in it'll load the movie to some random spot 50 minutes in and I can't go back. The scrubbing shows its all the way to the beginning yet it's not. Frustrating to the point where I'm afraid I'll ha w to gamble on another app. :S

content: I thought this app was easy to setup and it works perfect.

Disappointed. Paid for this app - using it on a note III. 2 main problems. 1. Can't make landscape stay fixed no matter what settings I choose. 2. App crashes anytime I hit the back button while viewing a video. Normally vlc products are awesome but this one needs work.
replyContent:
Hi Mik,
if you go into the settings and deselect 'movie rotation', then you'll see 'landscape only' in the setting. 
That should mean that the movie stays locked in landscape mode.
If that doesn't work, then please email us through the settings tab and we'll try to fix it.

content: But, this one has All the functionality I require PLUS, It works seamlessly across All my devices. Nexus One, Nexus S, Nexus 4, and Nexus7

VLC streamer always worked fine on my iphone, but I immediately had problems on the Galaxy Note 2 with choppy video.  After reading some reviews I saw that Hobbyist replied to someone with the same problem.  The solution was to change the encoding from MP3 to AAC or vice versa.  I tried that and it worked great.  Excellent app.
The best movie streamer iv come across. Easy to use on any device.
Works well on my Asus Infinity.
No issues so far,  very easy setup.

I am having problems with this app in android on a galaxy note 2. The video and audio stutters a lot on my device and is unusable for me. I would love to see this work!
replyContent:
Hi Deck,
Sorry this isn't working for you. The first thing you should try is switching the audio encoding from aac to mp3 (or vice versa). Unfortunately, there are some devices which fail miserably on one of the audio options. We ust set mp3 as the default on the s3 for this reason.
If that doesn't help - send me an email and we'll figure it out.

replyContent: Hi Denny, glad you like it!

content: Thank you for putting it on Android devices

replyContent: Hi Jason. Not quite sure what has happened here. We originally had a beta version out (free) and then changed that to the lite version (also free). This is the only paid version we have released. Having said that, if you have been charged twice, I'm sure we can sort it out - just email us on the support link and we'll get it fixed. Thanks.
